concept.title: Transmission Oil (TDTO)

audience.otherprops: maintenance personnel, reliability engineers, industrial engineers, safety and compliance officers, fleet managers

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Inspection and maintenance guidance for transmission TD/TO fluid, including level checks and top up procedures.

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: check and maintain transmission TDTO fluid levels to ensure reliable operation

note.p: These oils are formulated for transmissions and drive trains only, and should not be used in engines. Shortened engine life will result.

Multi-grade oils are not blended by Time for use in transmissions. Multi- grade oils which use high molecular weight polymers as viscosity index improvers lose their viscosity effectiveness by permanent and temporary shear of the viscosity index improver and therefore, are not recommended for transmission and drive train compartments.
Failure to follow this recommendation can cause shortened transmission life due to material incompatibility, inadequate frictional requirements for disk materials and/or excessive gear wear.

conbody.p: The oils according to ZF TE-ML03 specifications could be used.
